price: Kandi ibyo bajyaga bakora nta cyo byabamariye.
arabic: فَمَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: famā aghnā ʿanhum mā kānū yaksibūna
